excerpt: Baroque Catholic church built in 1736, featuring a tall tower offering sweeping city views.
detail_description: The Church of St. Euphemia is a magnificent Baroque-style Catholic church constructed in 1736, located in the charming town of Rovinj. The church's standout feature is its impressive 60-meter tower, which provides panoramic views of the cityscape, including red rooftops, bustling streets, the port with ships and boats, and the picturesque marina filled with yachts.
name: Church of St. Euphemia

excerpt: Built in 1679, this stone archway features elaborate carvings including a winged lion.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Rovinj, Croatia, Balbi's Arch is a stunning example of Baroque architecture that dates back to 1679. This intricately carved stone archway once served as a primary entrance to the medieval fortified town during Venetian rule. As you pass through Balbi's Arch, you're transported into a charming world filled with picturesque streets leading up to the magnificent Church of St Euphemia.
name: Balbi's Arch

excerpt: Rovinj is a Croatian fishing port on the west coast of the Istrian peninsula. The old town stands on a headland, with houses tightly crowded down to the seafront. A tangle of cobbled streets leads to the hilltop church of St. Euphemia, whose towering steeple dominates the skyline. South of the old town is Lone Bay, one of the area’s pebble beaches. The Rovinj archipelago’s 14 islands lie immediately off the mainland.
detail_description: Rovinj, a picturesque Croatian fishing port located on the Istrian peninsula's west coast, boasts an old town perched on a headland with tightly packed houses leading down to the seafront. The area is characterized by its cobbled streets and the prominent hilltop church of St. Euphemia, offering stunning views of the surrounding landscape.
name: Rovinj

excerpt: Traditional venue with permanent & temporary exhibits showcasing art & regional history.
detail_description: Rovinj Heritage Museum is a must-visit traditional venue in Rovinj, showcasing a rich collection of art and regional history. Housed in a stunning 17th Century Baroque-style palace, the museum features permanent and temporary exhibits including modern and old art, archaeological findings, ethnology, books, documents, and photos of partisan battalion Pino Budicin from World War II. The museum also hosts temporary art exhibitions on the ground floor during summer.
name: Rovinj Heritage Museum

excerpt: Secluded, rocky cove popular for swimming, with pebble & sand beaches & views of nearby islands.
detail_description: Golden Cape, also known as Zlatni rt, is a secluded and rocky cove in western Istria, offering pebble and sand beaches with stunning views of nearby islands. The area is home to a beautiful forest park that was established by entrepreneur Georg Hutterott in the late 19th century. This park features a rich variety of botanical species, tree-lined paths, promenades, trails, and meadows.
name: Golden Cape

detail_description: Rovinj Old Town is a charming place with a historical clock tower that once served as part of the city's defenses. The tower, dating back to 1100 and later updated by the Venetians, features a relief of the winged Lion of St. Mark just beneath its clock face.
name: Sightseeing Rovinj Old Town

excerpt: Fjordlike channel between forested slopes, with outfitters offering boat excursions from Rovinj.
detail_description: Lim Fjord, located near Rovinj in the Istria Peninsula, is a popular natural attraction that offers boat excursions. Despite not being a true fjord, it still captivates visitors with its picturesque scenery. The 10km estuary is flanked by steep cliffs and dense pine trees on one side and deciduous trees on the other, creating a striking contrast against the blue waters and grey limestone cliffs.
name: Lim

excerpt: Tranquil park featuring tall cedar & cypress trees, grassy picnic areas, boating & swimming.
detail_description: Park forest Zlatni Rt, located about 2.5 km south of Rovinj city center, is a serene park with tall cedar and cypress trees, offering grassy picnic areas and opportunities for boating and swimming. The park also hosts the Adris 44Cup sailing cup organized by Sail La Vie and JK Maestral at the end of May.
name: Park forest Zlatni Rt

detail_description: Rovinj Aquarium, located outside the old town on Obala G. Paliage, is a historic attraction that dates back to 1891 when it was established as the Zoological Department of the Berlin Aquarium Unter den Linden. As one of Europe's oldest aquariums, it showcases marine life from the Adriatic Sea, including scorpionfish and pufferfish.
name: Rovinj Aquarium

excerpt: Cultural center & museum dedicated to preserving & documenting local maritime & fishing culture.
detail_description: Nestled in the charming town of Rovinj, Croatia, the Batana Eco-Museum serves as a vibrant cultural hub dedicated to preserving and celebrating the region's rich maritime and fishing heritage. This unique museum focuses on the iconic wooden batana boats that symbolize local fishing traditions. Visitors can immerse themselves in an engaging multimedia exhibition featuring interactive displays, videos, photographs, and authentic artifacts that narrate the history of these traditional vessels.
name: Batana Eco-Museum

detail_description: Rovinj, also known as Rovigno, is a charming and romantic town located on a small peninsula with houses built on sea cliffs. The picturesque old town features narrow streets lined with art galleries, authentic taverns, coffee shops, and bars. Throughout the year, the town hosts various festivals, concerts, and attractions that showcase its rich historical and cultural heritage. Visitors can plan their trip to coincide with events such as St.
name: Rovinj

detail_description: Lone Bay is a stunning coastal gem located just over a kilometer from the heart of Rovinj, making it easily accessible for both locals and visitors. This picturesque beach is nestled within the lush surroundings of Zlatni Rt park, where fragrant pines and Mediterranean flora create an enchanting backdrop. The beach itself features a delightful mix of pebbles and rocks, complemented by crystal-clear waters that are perfect for swimming and snorkeling adventures.
name: Lone bay

excerpt: Small marketplace with vendors selling fruit, vegetables, fish & olive oils, plus souvenirs.
detail_description: Rovinj Market is a bustling marketplace in a beautiful seaside location. It operates daily from 8 AM to 9 PM, offering an array of fresh products such as fruits, vegetables, fish, and homemade souvenirs like olive oils and honey. The market also features small souvenir shops with magnets and handmade goods.
name: Rovinj Market

detail_description: Old Town Apartments - BRESKI is located in the charming Old Town of Rovinj, a picturesque area filled with cobblestone paths, narrow alleys, and quaint squares. The area is adorned with historic churches, antique shops, and inviting cafes. Visitors can't miss the iconic Church of St. Euphemia, a significant monument in Rovinj. The old town showcases Venetian-influenced architecture and steep lanes that lead to lively fishing ports.
name: Old Town Apartments - BRESKI
address: Ul. Ricarda Daveggie 3 1st, 2nd and 3rd floor, 52210, Rovinj, Croatia

detail_description: Located in the Old Town, Mediterraneo Cocktail Bar offers a stunning setting right by the Adriatic Sea. It's a popular spot for sipping quality mixed drinks at reasonable prices while enjoying the orange sunset. The bar stays open well into October and provides free blankets for those who want to enjoy a scenic drink out of season.
name: Mediterraneo Cocktail Bar

detail_description: Punta Corrente Park, also known as Golden Cape, is a serene natural park located just south of Rovinj. Originally envisioned by Austrian industrialist Johann Georg von Hutterott in the 19th century, the park boasts a lush softwood forest filled with cedar, Douglas fir, cypress, and Aleppo pine trees that were planted over a century ago. Visitors can enjoy leisurely walks along well-maintained pathways with convenient amenities such as rubbish bins and benches for resting.
name: Punta Corrente Park

detail_description: When visiting the Port of Rovinj, be sure to take in the romantic fishing harbor that sits right in front of the old town. The colorful town houses create a picturesque backdrop for memorable photos. Strolling along the harbor promenade offers an authentic and tranquil atmosphere, allowing you to observe local fishermen at work. Additionally, visitors can find boat rentals and excursion boats here, offering opportunities to explore the beautiful island surroundings off the coast of Rovinj.
name: Port of Rovinj

excerpt: Classy restaurant with a rustic-chic ambiance offering locally sourced food & a robust wine list.
detail_description: Monte is a classy restaurant with a rustic-chic ambiance that offers locally sourced food and an extensive wine list. The restaurant hosts inspiring performances and panels featuring distinguished chefs, including the Spanish chef and owner Alejandro Serrano. Situated in Rovinj, Monte is known for its imaginative dishes that combine global influences with local Istrian ingredients and culinary traditions. Located at the foot of the Church of St.
name: Monte

detail_description: Mulini Beach is a stunning rocky beach located near the picturesque forest park Zlatni rt in Rovinj. It's within walking distance of the Old Town and offers a combination of pebbles and concrete shores, making it perfect for swimmers and snorkelers of all ages. The gradual slope into calm waters provides smooth, clear underwater views.
name: Mulini Beach

detail_description: Monkodonja, also known as The Mikena of Istria, is a fascinating archaeological site dating back to the Bronze Age around 1800 BC. Located on a scenic hill just outside Rovinj, Croatia, this ancient hill fort boasts remarkably well-preserved stone walls standing at least a meter tall. The layout consists of an acropolis and upper and lower town areas enclosed by three-meter-high drywall stone blocks.
name: Monkodonja, gradina, arheološko nalazište

detail_description: Plaža Balota in Rovinj is a charming coastal area that offers clear waters for swimming and sunbathing. It's a small recreational spot with stone walking paths and stairs leading to the crystal-clear water from the Old Town. Unlike typical city beaches, Plaža Balota features large rocks for sunbathing and ladders for entering the blue waters.
name: Plaža Balota

detail_description: Windsurf Center Red Island is a fantastic spot for water sports and adventure in Rovinj. Visitors have had an amazing time windsurfing and kayaking around the beautiful small islands, enjoying the crystal clear waters and abundant marine life. The staff, particularly Neno, are highly praised for their friendliness and knowledge, providing guidance on activities and conditions. Additionally, guests have appreciated the considerate and accommodating nature of the center's team.
name: Windsurf center Red Island

detail_description: Watersport Red Island offers a relaxing day on Crveni Otok (Red Island) where visitors can enjoy swimming, snorkeling, and leisurely walks through the pine trees. Katarina Island provides peaceful beaches, a vineyard, and ancient olive trees for a serene experience. Jet skis are available for rent with good prices and effective performance reaching 30/40 knots.
name: WATERSPORT RED ISLAND
address: Crveni otok (Otočić Sveti Andrija, 52210, Rovinj, Croatia

excerpt: Hip, enduring champagne & cocktail bar with sea & sunset views, plus shoreline seating on cushions.
detail_description: Valentino Cocktail & Champagne Bar is a renowned and upscale establishment in Rovinj, Croatia. Since its opening in 1989, it has captivated visitors with its stunning location by the sea and captivating sunset views. The bar's classic and old-school ambiance, coupled with its dramatic waterfront setting near Rovinj harbor, has made it a favorite among locals and tourists alike.
name: Valentino Cocktail & Champagne Bar

detail_description: Gelateria Italia, located in the picturesque coastal town of Rovinj, is a top recommendation for authentic Italian gelato in Istria. Run by an Italian family from Brescia, this charming gelateria offers a delightful array of flavors that vary daily. Visitors rave about favorites like pistachio, peach, mango, and the rich dark chocolate known as Don Pepe. The husband can often be seen crafting the gelato behind a glass wall while his wife serves customers.
name: Gelateria Italia

detail_description: Nestled along the picturesque seafront of Rovinj, Maestral Restaurant is a hidden gem that beckons visitors to pause and savor its charm. This seasonal outdoor eatery offers a delightful dining experience right by the water, making it an ideal spot for families looking to enjoy a meal in a relaxed atmosphere. While some may venture further into the historic district, those who know better will appreciate Maestral's inviting ambiance and diverse menu.
name: Maestral Restaurant

detail_description: Konoba Jure is a popular dining spot in Rovinj, known for its delicious and abundant Istrian delicacies offered at reasonable prices. The restaurant is situated in an attractive apartment complex, featuring both a beautiful terrace surrounded by Mediterranean plants and a rustic interior with a large stone oven. The menu varies depending on the daily ingredients available, but guests can always enjoy the Istrian platter.
name: Konoba Jure

detail_description: Tucked away in one of Rovinj's charming side streets near the harbor, Restoran Veli Jože stands as a testament to the region's rich culinary heritage. This historic eatery, known for its warm ambiance adorned with antiques and maritime decor, feels like stepping into a living museum. Veli Jože specializes in traditional Istrian cuisine, offering delightful dishes such as shellfish lasagne, crab with truffles, cod cooked in white wine, and succulent baked lamb paired with potatoes.
name: Restoran Veli Jože

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Rovinj Old Town, Caffe Bar XL is a popular spot for locals and tourists alike. Situated near the Church of St. Euphemia, this charming bar offers stunning views of the Adriatic Sea, making it an ideal place to catch a breathtaking sunset.
name: Caffe Bar XL

detail_description: Located just off the Rovinj boardwalk, Otok Sveta Katarina is home to a hotel and recreation complex. Boats run every 30 minutes, making it easily accessible for non-guests. The island boasts diverse plant life and rocky beaches, offering a perfect spot to witness stunning sunsets over Rovinj. From the island, visitors can enjoy picturesque views of Rovinj's historic buildings on the horizon.
name: Otok Sveta Katarina

detail_description: ACI Marina Rovinj offers not only fantastic attractions but also impressively beautiful beaches in the area. Visitors are often surprised by the stunning beach opportunities located near the city, with fine pebble coves surrounded by Mediterranean vegetation and beautiful turquoise sea colors. For boat enthusiasts, this is the perfect place to see all types of boats, from small ones to luxury yachts.
name: ACI Marina Rovinj
address: ACI Rovinj, Šetalište Vijeća Europe, 52210, Rovinj, Croatia

name: La Casa di Loreto apartments, Rovinj

detail_description: Mini Croatia is a delightful attraction that offers a variety of experiences. Visitors can enjoy truffle hunting tours with dogs, explore replicas of famous Croatian landmarks, and learn about the country's special buildings such as the Arena of Pula and the old town of Dubrovnik. The tour also showcases natural wonders like Plitvice Lakes and Krka National Park, as well as several islands including Lokrum, Krk, Pag, Brac, and Hvar.
name: Mini Croatia

detail_description: Beach bar Porton Biondi is situated just north of Rovinj's city center, within walking distance or a short drive from the Old Town. The beach itself is mostly rocky and concrete with some gravel inlets, providing easy access to the sea. Visitors can enjoy the picturesque view of Rovinj's old town while relaxing on this beautiful beach. Additionally, there are a couple of beach bars and trees offering shade.
name: Beach bar Porton Biondi

excerpt: Tiny island in the Adriatic Sea featuring a hotel, a beach & a water-sports center.
detail_description: Sveti Andrija, a tiny island in the Adriatic Sea, is home to a hotel, beach, and water sports center. Originally a Benedictine Monastery established in the 6th century AD, it was later expanded by the Franciscan order and refurbished into a hotel in the late 19th century. The island offers various amenities such as a swimming pool, beaches, restaurants, coffee shops, and even a nude beach.
name: Sveti Andrija

detail_description: Stancija Collis is a charming family-owned boutique winery located in the midst of vineyards, just 6 km from Rovinj. Visitors can easily reach the winery by cab or bike to enjoy wine tasting, stunning views, and a laid-back ambiance. Guests have had memorable experiences at Stancija Collis, where they sampled a variety of organic wines while being regaled with stories about the winery's history and the family's dedication to biodynamic production.
name: Stancija Collis

excerpt: Surrounded by shady pine trees, this popular cove beach features swimming, sunbathing & picnicking.
detail_description: Nestled amidst a serene backdrop of shady pine trees, Cuvi Beach is a delightful cove that invites visitors to indulge in swimming, sunbathing, and picnicking. This picturesque spot is perfect for those seeking tranquility or leisurely strolls along the coast. As you explore the area, you'll find comfort under fragrant evergreens or enjoy a refreshing drink at one of the charming seaside cafes. Located just 1.
name: Cuvi Beach
OPG Šuran Petar Rino - Rovinjska vina

detail_description: Dolphin Watching in Rovinj is a great way to enjoy the natural beauty of Croatia while watching these fascinating creatures. The dolphins can be seen both in the harbor and out at sea, making it a great place to watch the sun set.
name: Dolphin Watching Rovinj

detail_description: The beach FKK Beach Punta Križ is a beautiful place to relax and enjoy the sun. It can be a great place for night parties, especially for adult only.
name: FKK Beach Punta Križ

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Rovinj, C.B. Schneider Modern Art Gallery is a vibrant hub for art enthusiasts eager to explore an eclectic mix of contemporary works. This gallery showcases a diverse array of pieces from both local and international artists, including unique creations like Maria Curc's charming hand-painted clothes pins and striking modern installations. Visitors can also enjoy the warm hospitality of Vesna, the artist's wife, who adds a personal touch to every visit.
name: C.B.Schneider Modern Art Gallery

detail_description: Church of St. Thomas is situated 4 km from Rovinj, adjacent to the old Rovinj-Kanfanar railroad. Its layout forms a cross, with a bell tower added on the north side during extensive renovations in the 16th century. The church dates back to the 8th-9th centuries and remains well-preserved despite some vandalism to its information board.
name: Church of St. Thomas

detail_description: Admiral Automat Club Rovinj offers a well-organized gaming experience with various slot machines and roulette. The club has a separate room for non-smokers, providing a more comfortable environment for all visitors. With a minimum bet of HRK 1, the roulette machine is easily accessible to players. Visitors can enjoy music while playing and take advantage of the 24/7 opening hours. Additionally, there's an option to purchase beer at reasonable prices.
name: Admiral Automat Club Rovinj

detail_description: Pisino Castle is a fascinating blend of ancient charm and modern updates, featuring impressive exhibits spanning 600 years of history. Situated on a cliffside, it offers decent views and overlooks the Pazincica river canyon. The museum inside covers the rich history of Istria, with interactive displays that make it worth your time. Additionally, the castle's location near Pazin's market square and attractions like the Zip Line and Pazin cave add to its appeal as a must-visit destination.
name: Pazin Castle
